commands_raw:
?> Test long text in dialogue box and options -> test long text

?> Increase lamb mask value by 1? -> lamb mask increase

?> Decrease lamb mask value by 1? -> lamb mask decrease

?> Check if lamb mask value is greater than 5 -> check lamb mask greater 5

?> Test popup -> test popup

?> more options ->options2
name: start

commands_raw:
Increasing stat by 1
signal(changeparam,other_mask,1)
Lamb mask: ${other_mask}
?> back to start -> start
name: lamb mask increase

commands_raw:
Decreasing stat by 1
signal(changeparam,other_mask,-1)
Lamb mask: ${other_mask}
?> back to start -> start
name: lamb mask decrease

commands_raw:
signal(checkparam,>,other_mask,5)
Comparison result: ${comparison_result}
if there's nothing above it means false, false is not displayed because it's false...
?> back to start -> start
name: check lamb mask greater 5
